titles.title: To designate the United States Courthouse for the Eastern District of Virginia in Alexandria, Virginia, as the "Albert V. Bryan United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/12/1995--Introduced. Designates the United States Courthouse for the Eastern District of Virginia, located at Courthouse Square South and Jamieson Avenue in Alexandria, Virginia, as the Albert V. Bryan United States Courthouse. Provides that the Federal building located at 200 South Washington Street in Alexandria, Virginia, shall no longer be so designated.
